EmailTemplate.description: When Kickbox Batch gets failed that time this email template will use for email notifications to the all user which are in Kikbox API setting.
EmailTemplate.name: Leads Batch_Failure Invalid Date Format
EmailTemplate.subject: Kickbox Verification Batch Run failed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Kickbox Verification Batch Run failed because of the invalid date format. The format should be "mm-dd-yyyy". Or check From Date and To Date. To Date should be greater than From Date.
Thank you.
